name: Isle of Enchantment
description:
Once upon a time… you are suffering from writer’s block in the library’s bookstacks when the perfect solution arrives: a mysterious man with an even more mysterious proposition. Rewrite a story for him, and in return experience the adventure of a lifetime in the realm of Historia. But not everything is as it seems in this fairy tale realm filled with pirates, wolves, and endless adventures. Will you finish your story and find your happily ever after?

This story can be found by downloading the Fictif app for free, available in the Google Play Store and App Store. Fictif contains multiple visual novel stories to play in various genres.
